title: Forecast : PaaS market share in 2011 - 2016 , by service
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 11 different Cloud Services on X-axis for 2 groups 2011, and 2016. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2011. The minimum Market share was observed in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) for 2011.

In Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS), 2011 had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) out of all 11 Cloud Services.

The maximum Market share for 2011 that was found in Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) was 35.0 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS).
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 11 different Cloud Services on X-axis for 2 groups 2011, and 2016. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

In Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS), 2011 had the highest Market share 35.0 among the 2 groups and in Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS), 2011 had the lowest Market share 1.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 11 different Cloud Services on X-axis for 2 groups 2011, and 2016. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2011. The minimum Market share was observed in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) for 2011.

In Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS), 2011 had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) out of all 11 Cloud Services.

The maximum Market share for 2011 that was found in Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) was 35.0 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS).
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 11 different Cloud Services for 2 groups 2011, and 2016 that are presented on the X-axis.

In Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS), 2011 had the highest Market share 35.0 among the 2 groups and in Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS), 2011 had the lowest Market share 1.0.

In Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS), 2011 had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) out of all 11 Cloud Services.

The maximum Market share for 2011 that was found in Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) was 35.0 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Cloud Service Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS).

Among all 2 groups, 2011 had the gap of 34.0 between the maximum and minimum Market share observed in Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) and Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) respectively.

Averaging all 2 groups 2011, and 2016, the Cloud Service Cloud Application platform services (aPaaS) is the maximum Market share and Cloud Horizontal Portal Services (Portal PaaS) is the minimum Market share.
